lead_paragraph: Nascar officials said there was not enough time to grant Kentucky Speedway a Sprint Cup race in 2009. Bruton Smith, owner of Speedway Motorsports Inc., announced Thursday that he had purchased the Kentucky track with the intention of having a Cup race there next year.
